name: Byron The Frog
description:
Byron, the frog

Byron is a cosmic frog from the Ranulfo planet who was left in The Earth by mistake. Its mision is to get to the Moon where it has a spaceship which it could use for coming back home.

You will have to look for and get five keys in each level before the time expire.

Will you be able to help Byron to come back home?

Control  (How to play)

Left and right arrow: move to left and right

Space bar: jump (short press = short jump, long press = long jump)

C: fire

X: keep x key pressed for longer jumps and faster runs

F4: screen mode

F5: save game

F6: Load saved game

ESC: Exit game

CREDITS
